songs.title: Life Ain’t Been Fair to Us
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Life ain't been fair to us (Mmm, yeah)
I see the light but I... can’t adjust
And sometimes it's hard to trust
'Cause life ain’t been fair to us

[Verse]
Signin' fucked up deals
Just to pay bills
Don't feel like myself anymore
Fucking hate being ignored
Just wanna hop in a Aventador
